author: jason.luke.steel@gmail.com
post_text: September 13, 2018 at 6:08 AM#1Hi there does any one know the CMD line for automating the adding of a CMD line into a specific cue?EG Add (Assign SOLO Executor 106) to 106.4 ????This way in a stack when i go to a curtain cue in my stack it will change my flash key to Solo then i can have one in the next cue changing it back to Flash....Thanks

posts.author: jason.luke.steel@gmail.com
posts.post_text: September 13, 2018 at 6:08 AM#1Hi there does any one know the CMD line for automating the adding of a CMD line into a specific cue?EG Add (Assign SOLO Executor 106) to 106.4 ????This way in a stack when i go to a curtain cue in my stack it will change my flash key to Solo then i can have one in the next cue changing it back to Flash....Thanks

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: September 13, 2018 at 6:27 PM#2Assign object /property=valueAssign object /property="value with space"object=Cue 106.4property=CMDvalue="Assign Swop Executor 106"CodeAssign Cue 106.4 /CMD="Assign Swop Executor 106"

posts.author: jason.luke.steel@gmail.com
posts.post_text: September 13, 2018 at 11:23 PM#3Thanks Glad Thats what i was trying... but then after more discovery found i have to goAssign Executor 106  Cue 4 /CMD="Assign Swop Executor 106"It didn't like the Cue 106.4 command or just the EXEC 106.4 command....Thanks heaps though glad i was on the right track...

title: Adding CMD line into cue by command line
